DOC.brief_summary: This is a 2-year study to assess the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of an investigational drug in obese patients.
DOC.brief_title: A 2-Year Study of an Investigational Drug in Obese Patients (0557-011)
DOC.criteria: Obese men and nonpregnant women at least 18 years of age with a specific body mass index (height and weight ratio) required by the study Patients with uncontrolled high blood pressure and/or diabetes mellitus (high blood sugar)
